dcterms:creator: Andrew Maas
Raymond E. Daly
Peter T. Pham
Dan Huang
Andrew Y. Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: The IMDb dataset was developed for sentiment classification where systems should classify the polarity of a given movie review as positive or negative. It contains 50K labeled movie reviews.
dcterms:title: IMDb

dcterms:creator: Hadi Amiri
Hal DaumA e III
dcterms:description: The Churn dataset contains more than 5K tweets about three telecommunication brands, developed for the task of churn prediction where systems should predict if a Twitter post indicates user intention about leaving a brand.
dcterms:title: Churn
